attributes.title: San Diego
attributes.caption: San Diego
attributes.description: Rooster Teeth Animated Adventures #1 is the story of Geoff and Gus encountering some rude passengers on their flight to San Diego.

attributes.title: Statue
attributes.caption: Statue
attributes.description: Rooster Teeth Animated Adventures #2 is the story of Burnie and his fight to get a statue of him erected in Burnie, Tasmania.

attributes.title: Lightning
attributes.caption: Lightning
attributes.description: Rooster Teeth Animated Adventures #3 is the story of Geoff and his experience with lightning and a surly tow truck driver.

attributes.title: Headlight Fluid
attributes.caption: Headlight Fluid
attributes.description: Rooster Teeth Animated Adventures #4 is the story of Gavin and his work with a professional stunt driver who had an accident.

attributes.title: Expert Parent
attributes.caption: Expert Parent
attributes.description: Rooster Teeth Animated Adventures #5 is the story of Geoff and his advice on how to raise a child.

attributes.title: Omnibus 1
attributes.caption: Omnibus 1
attributes.description: Rooster Teeth Animated Adventures #6 is a collection of stories. Watch as Burnie trolls frightened airplane passengers, Gavin experiences America in its purest form, a misplaced phone upsets Burnie and Gus' car gets egged.

attributes.title: Omnibus 2
attributes.caption: Omnibus 2
attributes.description: Rooster Teeth Animated Adventures #7 is a collection of stories. Watch as young Geoff gets an adult in trouble, the podcast crew meets "the man", and young Burnie thinks he may have set a world record.

attributes.title: Omnibus 3
attributes.caption: Omnibus 3
attributes.description: Rooster Teeth Animated Adventures #10 is a collection of stories; Gus shows the "situation" to some people at PAX East, Burnie learns what "cribbing" is.

attributes.title: New Orleans pt 1
attributes.caption: New Orleans pt 1
attributes.description: Rooster Teeth Animated Adventures #8 tells the first part of the story of Geoff and Griffon in New Orleans.

attributes.title: New Orleans pt 2
attributes.caption: New Orleans pt 2
attributes.description: Rooster Teeth Animated Adventures #9 tells the conclusion of Geoff and Griffon's eventful trip to New Orleans

attributes.title: Double Derps
attributes.caption: Double Derps
attributes.description: Rooster Teeth Animated Adventures #11 tells the story about two idiots and their questions about stromboli and soda machines.

attributes.title: Shakedowns & Breakdowns
attributes.caption: Shakedowns & Breakdowns
attributes.description: Rooster Teeth Animated Adventures #12 is the story of Millie learning how to use the threat of violence to get what she wants. Additionally, Gus and Geoff revisit their discussion about why the rules on a plane are important. Finally, Joel explains why he was right about everything.

attributes.title: Party of the Dead
attributes.caption: Party of the Dead
attributes.description: Rooster Teeth Animated Adventures #13 shows the Rooster Teeth crew recreating a gaming industry party and tells the story of Burnie's older brother trolling him into thinking Dawn of the Dead was based on a true story.

attributes.title: Joel Hates Snakes
attributes.caption: Joel Hates Snakes
attributes.description: Rooster Teeth Animated Adventures #14 shows Joel and his brother terrorizing his neighborhood with a snake Audio from Rooster Teeth Podcast 119.Animation by JayOrDan

attributes.title: Gus Anesthesia
attributes.caption: Gus Anesthesia
attributes.description: Rooster Teeth Animated Adventures #15 shows Gus' true colors once he is under the effects of mind altering drugs.   Audio from Rooster Teeth Podcast 126. Animation by JayOrDan

attributes.title: Kara's Exciting Day
attributes.caption: Kara's Exciting Day
attributes.description: Rooster Teeth Animated Adventures #16 tells of the things Kara enjoys most about her job at Rooster Teeth. As a bonus in this episode, Joel talks about Geoff's fancy grill.

attributes.title: Fun With Earthquakes
attributes.caption: Fun With Earthquakes
attributes.description: Rooster Teeth Animated Adventures #17 shares the RT Crew's thoughts about earthquakes including Matt's first earthquake and Gus' earthquake fetish.Audio from Rooster Teeth PodcastAnimation by JayOrDan

attributes.title: Gus vs Machete Man
attributes.caption: Gus vs Machete Man
attributes.description: Rooster Teeth Animated Adventures #18 is Gus' story about nearly getting hacked to death by a crazed machete wielding maniac in El Paso.Audio from Rooster Teeth Podcast #126Animation by JayOrDan

attributes.title: Burnie Fights Animals
attributes.caption: Burnie Fights Animals
attributes.description: Rooster Teeth Animated Adventures #19 is Burnie explaining why he isn't afraid of any animal and claims he can fight any of them.

attributes.title: Shamu Plane and Naked Joel
attributes.caption: Shamu Plane and Naked Joel
attributes.description: Rooster Teeth Animated Adventures #20 tells the story about Jack's excitement to ride the Shamu plane and Joel's confusion with hospital gowns.

attributes.title: Burnie and Joel's Bathroom Encounter
attributes.caption: Burnie and Joel's Bathroom Encounter
attributes.description: Rooster Teeth Animated Adventures #21 is Joel's story about Burnie invading his privacy in a hotel room shower. A steamy situation results.

attributes.title: Burnie Burns Horse Puncher
attributes.description: Animated Adventures #22 is the story of Burnie and his epic horse punching fight against a hungry horse. Animation by JayOrDan http://roosterteeth.com/jayordan

attributes.title: Brandon and the Electric Fence
attributes.description:
Rooster Teeth Animated Adventures #23 is the story of Burnie's attempt to murder Brandon using an electric fence in New Zealand

Animation by JayOrDan.

attributes.title: Cookies and Hobos
attributes.description:
Rooster Teeth Animated Adventures #24 tells how Girls Scouts use their guilt powers to force you to buy cookies.  It also tells the story about the homeless guy who was always having his legs cut off.

Animation by JayOrDan http://roosterteeth.com/jayordan

Audio from Rooster Teeth Podcast: http://roosterteeth.com/podcast/

attributes.title: Michael Meets a Drug Dealer
attributes.description:
Rooster Teeth Animated Adventures #25 tells how Michael met a drug dealer in New York City with an offer that was difficult to refuse...

Animation by JayOrDan.
